channel.title: Lawrence MacAulay
channel.description: Recent news about Lawrence MacAulay, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by The Guardian Charlottetown
item.description:
Prince Edward Island MP likens marijuana use to rum running
Cardigan MP Lawrence MacAulay, a Liberal, muses on his party's view on decriminalizing marijuana the day after Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau told reporters he'd smoked pot a few times in the past, including while he was a sitting MP. Published on August ...
